data.name: ApplyChangesBtn
data.comment: Text on the Send Data button in edit mode

data.name: DateErrorEnd
data.value: Время окончания должно быть позже времени начала.
data.comment: Error message thrown when trying to set an end date earlier than the start date

data.name: DateErrorStart
data.value: Время начала должно быть раньше, чем время окончания.
data.comment: Error message thrown when trying to set a start date later than the end date

data.name: DeleteReportConf
data.value: Отчёт будет удален из базы данных и невозможно отменить это действие
data.comment: Confirmation message when trying to delete the report

data.name: DeleteReportErr
data.comment: Error thrown when trying to delete the report

data.name: EditButton
data.comment: Text on the button for edit action

data.name: EndDateFilter
data.comment: End Date Item for date filtering

data.name: EnterEditModeBtn
data.comment: Text written on the edit mode button when the edit mode is not active

data.name: ExitEditModeBtn
data.comment: Text written on the edit mode button when the edit mode is active

data.name: HeaderEditTitle
data.comment: Title of the header form window in edition mode

data.name: NoDateFilter
data.comment: No Date Filter Item for date filtering

data.name: NoDefectLbl
data.comment: No registered defect indication

data.name: NoDefectSelectedErr
data.comment: Error thrown when no defects are selected but defect action is requested

data.name: NoOrderErr
data.value: Не найдено ни одного заказа на продукт
data.comment: Error thrown when no orders are found for the specified product

data.name: NoProductSelectedErr
data.value: Заполните код продукта, прежде чем искать заказы
data.comment: Error thrown when trying to look for production order before filling the product fill

data.name: NoRowSelectedErr
data.value: Ни одна строка не выбрана. Выберите строку
data.comment: Error thrown no rows are selected and selection is requested

data.name: OrderForm
data.comment: Title of the order form

data.name: RemoveAllDefectConf
data.value: Все дефекты будут удалены, и будет невозможно отменить это действие
data.comment: Confirmation message when trying to remove all the defects

data.name: SendDataConf
data.value: Данные будут отправлены в базу данных. Проверьте данные и нажмите «Продолжить», если все в порядке.
data.comment: Confirmation message when trying to send the data to DB

data.name: SendDataErr
data.comment: Error thrown when sending data to DB is not possible

data.name: StartDateFilter
data.comment: Start Date Item for date filtering
